post:
<a href="https://www.racknerd.com/11-11"><img src="https://blog.racknerd.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/racknerd-11.11.jpg"></a></img>
 
We're back! RackNerd has been extremely busy on the backend recently, it's been a constant battle of replenishing stock and selling out. Despite us setting a lot of our previous promotions out of stock, demand skyrocketed lately and we've still been selling out. The good news is, we've deployed tons of new servers throughout the past month, some of these locations include: **Los Angeles, San Jose, Dallas, Chicago, New York and Seattle**. Some of these locations have been sold out for an extended time due to tons of attention being on replenishing inventory, but at the same time expanding RackNerd's services and locations. We're so happy to have replenished inventory in these locations, and we're still working on more. That being said, we are now ready to present our **NEW 11.11 DEALS** with this awesome community :)

Last year we shared our 11.11 deals with the community which were extremely popular, this year we're back with all new specials, and to help allow everyone a chance to grab a VPS we are limiting the first two specials listed below with a max quantity limit per customer _(indicated below)_. Customers who are looking to deploy in bulk can always reach out to our sales team at sales@racknerd.com and we may approve it on a case by case basis.

The below 11.11 offers are powered by RAID-10 pure SSD, providing you with awesome performance, and competitive pricing.

**Double Bandwidth:** We will be doubling bandwidth for LET members 😎 Simply comment your order # if you're interested in FREE double bandwidth.
 
 <hr>
